app_descript:
App Name: Manta Comics
Package Name: net.manta.comic

Brief:

Dive into the vast sea of premium Korean storytelling with Manta Comics, your ultimate platform for unfettered comic binging. Manta Comics brings together a collection of exclusive, crowd-pleasing comics straight from Korea, delivering them to your fingertips with an unrivaled, unlimited reading experience. Catering to diverse tastes and constantly updated with fresh content, Manta Comics is designed to keep the story aficionado completely immersed without the hassle of a pay-per-episode model.
